subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Rutgers scored 20 points in about eight and a half minutes on its way to a 33-0 victory that made it difficult to tell if the Scarlet Knights’ defense was that good or the Illini’s offense was that bad.
